description:
The Rothenberg Law Firm LLP is one of the nation’s leading personal injury law firms. With offices in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as well as New York and New Jersey, we help injured clients across the country. Our legacy of success spans more than four-and-a-half decades.

Rooted In A Passion For Justice

For us, personal injury law is more than just a business; it’s a passion. Our attorneys and staff share a commitment to improving the lives of injured clients and their loved ones.

We take every client under our wings as though they were family. Valuing quality over quantity, we only accept cases we believe in, and we prepare to go the distance in fighting for justice.

The Rothenberg Way

Our approach – what we call “The Rothenberg Way” – has won our clients hundreds of millions of dollars in financial recovery over the years. Our lawyers approach every case with an aggressive, proactive strategy. By fully preparing for trial, leveraging cutting-edge technology, and enlisting the expertise of professionals in medical and scientific fields, we go the extra mile to lay the groundwork for success.

We don’t just focus on monetary compensation, however. We also provide holistic support for our clients by connecting them with medical care, counseling services, financial advice and other professional services necessary for coping with the tragic aftermath of a catastrophic injury or death in the family. Our goal is to guide clients through what, for many, is the darkest time in their lives.

Learn More About What Makes Us Different

Call 800-697-9967 for a free, no-obligation consultation. We look forward to hearing from you.
